pull.title: [tests] New fuzz target wallet_rpc
pull.body:
This change adds a new fuzz target `wallet_rpc`,
this change was suggested in https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/29901

This change use some of the functionality of the fuzz target `rpc` to also target the wallet rpc's

tree 295b30ead55fa76235d489fc032a4814539d44ac
parent 94c307b3c0746a08c6135ff38d6f1ad1ed6693bb
author kevkevinpal <oapallikunnel@gmail.com> 1721739531 -0400
committer kevkevinpal <oapallikunnel@gmail.com> 1727269386 -0400

test: new fuzz target wallet_rpc

By reusing some of the logic for the rpc fuzz target this new fuzz
target wallet_rpc adds coverage to the wallet rpc calls.

events.message:
test: new fuzz target wallet_rpc

By reusing some of the logic for the rpc fuzz target this new fuzz
target wallet_rpc adds coverage to the wallet rpc calls.

events.body: @brunoerg I think this should be ready for review now, I think I just need to currate the list of `WALLET_RPC_COMMANDS_SAFE_FOR_FUZZING` and `WALLET_RPC_COMMANDS_NOT_SAFE_FOR_FUZZING`

comments.body: I will need to move some of these over due to the rpc accessing the disk or network activity

This change should be replaced with the following diff:
```diff
--- a/src/wallet/test/fuzz/CMakeLists.txt
+++ b/src/wallet/test/fuzz/CMakeLists.txt
@@ -10,6 +10,7 @@ target_sources(fuzz
     fees.cpp
     $<$<BOOL:${USE_SQLITE}>:${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/notifications.cpp>
     parse_iso8601.cpp
+    rpc.cpp
     $<$<BOOL:${USE_SQLITE}>:${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/scriptpubkeyman.cpp>
     wallet_bdb_parser.cpp
 )
```
